name: magnet-picker
description: Chrome extension for parsing and saving magnet links from specific websites

scripts.build: npm run generate-icons && webpack && npm run copy-static && npm run check-build
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.copy-static: powershell New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path dist/assets, dist/popup, dist/content, dist/options && powershell Copy-Item -Force -Recurse src/assets/* dist/assets/ && powershell Copy-Item -Force src/manifest.json dist/ && powershell Copy-Item -Force src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && powershell Copy-Item -Force src/popup/popup.css dist/popup/ && powershell Copy-Item -Force src/content/content.css dist/content/ && powershell Copy-Item -Force src/options/options.html dist/options/ && powershell Copy-Item -Force src/options/options.css dist/options/
